text: Noor Zafar Khan () is a Pakistani television actress. The sister of actress Sarah Khan, she made her acting debut with a role of Noor-ul-Ain in Preet Na Kariyo Koi (2015). Khan was last seen playing a role of Noor in Hum TV's Bharam (2019). ==Early life== Khan was born on 8 August 1995 in Madina, Saudi Arabia to a Pakistani father and a Lebanese mother. She spent the early years of her life in Madina and moved to Pakistan with her family at the age of 7 where she did her schooling in Karachi. She has two sisters Sarah Khan and Aisha Khan and one brother Hamza Khan. ==Career== Khan started her career with modeling and appeared in several television commercials. She then played supporting roles in the political drama Preet Na Kariyo Koi (2015) and the religious drama Saya-e-Dewar Bhi Nahi (2016), before earning recognition with the romantic drama Gustakh Ishq (2017). In 2017, she appeared as Noor in Urdu1's short film Noor opposite Asim Azhar. She played a role of Zoya in Tau Dil Ka Kiya Hua (2017–2018) and made special appearance in Angeline Malik's anthology series Kabhi Band Kabhi Baja (2018). ==Television== {| class="wikitable ! scope="col"|Year ! scope="col"|Title ! scope="col"|Role ! scope="col"|Notes ! scope="col"|Notes |- |2015 |Kaise Huaye Benaam | | | |- |2015–2016 |Preet Na Kariyo Koi |Noor-ul-Ain (Noori) | | |- |2016 |Kitni Girhain Baaki Hain (season 2) |Romaisa |Episode 4 | |- |2016–2017 |Saya-e- Dewar Bhi Nahi |Shafaq | | |- |2017 |Noor |Noor |Telefilm | |- | 2017 |Gustakh Ishq |Maliha | | |- |2017 |Yeh Ishq Hai |Mariam |Episode "Tum Na Miltay To" | |- |2017–2018 | Tau Dil Ka Kia Hua |Zoya | | |- |2018 |Ustani Jee |Zarina | | |- |2018 |Kabhi Band Kabhi Baja |Herself |Episode 3 and 21 | |- |2019 |Bharam |Noor Mushtaq | | |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Pakistani television actresses Category:21st-century Pakistani actresses Category:People from Medina Category:Actresses from Karachi Category:Pakistani people of Lebanese descent
